game.name: Psionic Sentry : Infinite
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Psionic Sentry : Infinite is a third-person beautiful girl action shooting rougelike. The refreshing counterattack system that any player can use is the core of the game's operation. Observing the enemy's weaknesses and destroying them during battle is the focus of the game strategy.

reviewHighlights.text: 빵댕이좋아♡ 정면 바스트모핑 볼수있게 해줘잉~~~ 야겜으로 만들어줘잉~~~
